attributes.additional_details:
To the Honourable the Commons of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland in Parliament assembled I wish the Government to consider and implement a criteria for immigration law and entry of foreign nationals into the UK. The immigration law should be similar to that of our Commonwealth countries being Australia/New Zealand:-

*  Pass a particular points test including speak the English language and possess a particular trade skill

*  Have no criminal record

*  Have a net worth set so as not be be a burden on our benefits system

*  A 12 month limit of residence if employment not gained

*  A criminal offence resulting in a Court conviction results in deportation to the country of origin with immediate effect

*  Have a reasonable limit of acceptances per year
